name: Go-Ethereum
desc: Official golang implementation of the Ethereum protocol

options.name: <name>.authrpc.address
options.desc: Listen address of Go Ethereum Auth RPC API.

options.name: <name>.authrpc.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Go Ethereum Auth RPC API.

options.name: <name>.authrpc.jwtsecret
options.desc: Path to a JWT secret for authenticated RPC endpoint.

options.name: <name>.authrpc.port
options.desc: Port number of Go Ethereum Auth RPC API.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: <name>.authrpc.vhosts
options.desc: List of virtual hostnames from which to accept requests.

options.name: <name>.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Go Ethereum Node.

options.name: <name>.extraArgs
options.desc: Additional arguments passed to Go Ethereum.

options.name: <name>.gcmode
options.desc: Blockchain garbage collection mode.

options.name: <name>.http.address
options.desc: Listen address of Go Ethereum HTTP API.

options.name: <name>.http.apis
options.desc: APIs to enable over WebSocket

options.name: <name>.http.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Go Ethereum HTTP API.

options.name: <name>.http.port
options.desc: Port number of Go Ethereum HTTP API.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: <name>.maxpeers
options.desc: Maximum peers to connect to.

options.name: <name>.metrics.address
options.desc: Listen address of Go Ethereum metrics service.

options.name: <name>.metrics.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Go Ethereum prometheus metrics.

options.name: <name>.metrics.port
options.desc: Port number of Go Ethereum metrics service.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: <name>.network
options.desc: The network to connect to. Mainnet (null) is the default ethereum network.

options.name: <name>.package
options.desc: The geth package to use.

options.name: <name>.port
options.desc: Port number Go Ethereum will be listening on, both TCP and UDP.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: <name>.syncmode
options.desc: Blockchain sync mode.

options.name: <name>.websocket.address
options.desc: Listen address of Go Ethereum WebSocket API.

options.name: <name>.websocket.apis
options.desc: APIs to enable over WebSocket

options.name: <name>.websocket.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Go Ethereum WebSocket API.

options.name: <name>.websocket.port
options.desc: Port number of Go Ethereum WebSocket API.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)
